data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Ebonyi to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ebonyi, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Ebonyi, Nigeria by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,739,100 people living in Ebonyi, Nigeria. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Ebonyi, Nigeria to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Ukwa people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Ebonyi to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 448,034 believers in Ebonyi, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Ebonyi with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.
